post: It may leave a lingering curiosity if the L Markings on the Shroud were indeed 1st Century Gamma Markings signifying a type of Light Radiation (unknown then and now). And, that the Gamma Lumen Markings were created around the 1st century to either mimic the Light Radiation of the Image on the Shroud or to enhance, brand, and claim the Shroud Image as the ultimate Sacrifice searing in the code of Bodily Resurrection. Even suggesting that what created the Image also created the L Markings (Gammadia)..
